Speaker.Name: Jayesh Chauhan
Speaker.Description: He currently has the responsibility of developing online business models around the provider network businesses in Healthcare and Insurance. Jayesh has over 25 years of professional experience in the IT industry spanning consulting, delivery management and business leadership. Jayesh holds a dual degree of B. Tech in Computer Science, and M.Sc. in Mathematics, from BITS Pilani, India, an MBA from Dowling College, NY, USA, and an executive MBA from Indian School of Business (ISB), India.
